title: Viewing Party
description: Michael sabotages Erin's "Glee" viewing party because of his contempt for Gabe, Jim and Pam discover that Dwight can keep their daughter from crying, and Andy has a bad reaction to a mixture of wine and a Japanese stimulant.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [to Gabe] They caught the Scranton Stranger, they trapped him in his house. [run to conference room, everyone is watching the news on a monitor]

quotes.speaker: Reporter
quotes.text: Police have now surrounded the apartment complex.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [whispering to Pam] They have him surrounded. It's the SWAT. The SWAT's arriving.

quotes.speaker: Reporter
quotes.text: It is unknown if he is armed with anything.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: They should do that thing where they play the really good music to get him to come out.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [sighs] They shouldn't televise any of this, it just encourages copy-cats.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Just say copies, why do you have to drag cats into this.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Okay, while this is interesting we should get back to work. These stand-offs can last a long time. What if it's another Waco.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: It's pronounced wacko.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Some events are so news worthy, so historic, that you have to stop everything to watch. Balloon Boy, Michael Jackson's funeral. Things that if you didn't see them live, you wouldn't really care that you didn't see them at all.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Columbia Street in Washington Ave! When is he gonna come out? [phone rings, Kelly answers and hangs up]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I bet he's wishing he had a hybrid, right? Sixty miles to the gallon in the city.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: No! I bet he's wishing he was strangling someone!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Ok, that's our street! That's our street! He's going down our street! [runs out of conference room.] Come on everybody! [all quickly follow]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [on sidewalk] There it is! I saw it! I saw it! He went right by! You missed it! [all groan]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [collecting pebbles off the street into a jar] Grandpa, where were you the day the the Scranton Strangler was caught? [old man voice] Well kiddo, I was there. I was there... And I'll tell you what. [shakes jar of pebbles] You go sell these and buy yourself a nice spaceship.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Michael!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Walk with me.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Gabe and I are having a party, and everyone's invited, and it's at his house apartment and we're gonna watch Glee.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [obviously faking being serious the whole time] Glee? What is Glee, some television program? Jim I need that thing stat!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [confused] Okay?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Yeah it's a TV show...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Dwight! Sign please. I don't have time for parties I don't have time for TV shows. Stanley! What time is that thing I have to do?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Cancel it! Are you still here? [to Erin]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Uhh. It's just that it's our first party together so...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: MMM MMM MM MM MM! Did you hear what I said? I'm a very busy man. I don't have time for your TV show.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [sad] Okay, sorry.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm joking.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Wait which one?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm joking. I'm kidding around! I'm not actually angry. [Erin laughs] I'm not busy at all, I'm not doing anything. And I know what Glee is, I'm a total Gleek.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Good me too!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You know who my favorite character is? The invalid. [Jim makes a face] I am coming to your party.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I don't know if Michael likes Gabe that much, but there's this thing on Glee called mash-up, where two things that don't go together, make one great song. Take Gabe, take Michael, you make Gay Mike. Best friends.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: [reacting to Erin's invitation] No really? Is there time to change this?! That show! Now first they say that Mr. Schu doesn't know anything about choreography, then like three episodes later he's this fantastic choreographer?! Pick a lane people!

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: And what was with Jesse's sudden turn on Rachel, between Dream-On and Funk. Where the heck did that come from?! Honestly that show, it's just. It's irresponsible.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Are you going? [to Dwight]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Not because I want to. With all the feeling to base a show around. Glee? Thirst. Now that's a show I'd watch.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: I would watch that.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Tonight might be a convenient night for us to have some intercourse.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [to Erin] You're having a party at Gabe's apartment?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Mhmm! I'd love it if you were there.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: You would?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: You and Michael are always the life of the party!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Try and keep me from coming!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Why would I keep you from coming?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Try and hide it, I will track this party down!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Why would I hide it! [giggling]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Kevin!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Hey, you going tonight?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yes, I am. Are you?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Yeah! You gotta go to the boss's party!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What? No Gabe is... Gabe is not the boss.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: No he's not the boss.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Why did you just say he was the boss?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: 'Cause, you're the boss!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeeee... Guys! Do you consider Gabe to be the boss?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [to Michael at Gabe's apartment] It's make your own pizza night. Isn't Gabe's place so nice?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Uh huh...

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Look at the size of those wine glasses Michael!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Big...

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Those posters used to be real French ads.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: All right!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: So these are your cheeses, your ham, your sausages, your herbs, and your vegetables. Here's what's been done, so start creating. Some times it helps to think of a part of the world, and...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [interrupting] Okay okay okay.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Gabe likes to entertain a lot, ad he cooks in an oven, and all that jazz. I just have a different life style. They have these bags of vegetables that steam right inside their own bag. So I'll get a few ingredients, sit down in front of the TV, a bag of vegetables, before you know it I'm ready for bed!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [tossing pizza dough in the air]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: You don't really toss the dough.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Try and destroy the old ways, Gabe, well I will not let you. [throws pizza dough, hits the ceiling]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: [walking with Jim and Pam] Welcome to my Man Cave! I did my senior year in prog in Japan. Best year of my life.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You play? [referring to keyboard]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Oh! I like to play soundscapes. I imagine one instant of a song, expanded to be the size of the universe.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You can't even do that.

quotes.speaker: Cece
quotes.text: [crying]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: She's up! Great!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Cece, is reverse cycling, which means she sleeps all day and is up all night. Which basically means I'm up all day and I'm up all night. And if it doesn't stop soon, I am going to be up all night.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [peeking into various rooms] The show's starting. The show's starting! The show's starting! Show's starting! [Glee begins as all get nearby to watch]

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: [to Kelly] Who's that?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Finn.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Who's that?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Rachel.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Which one's Glee?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: You have to stop.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Where's Michael? Where's Michael? We can't start without Michael! Oh here he is! Ohhhh. Yayyy, and let the show begin! [turning up volume]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: [takes remote] It's a little loud...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Actually I think it's not loud enough. May I? Thank you sah! [takes remote, raises volume] There we go. Glee right? Rock and roll! Turn it up to elevaan! Spinal Cord!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: [lowers volum] Some of us are trying to have a conversation.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well some of us are trying to have a...

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: I'll just turn the captions on.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [grabs different remote from the table] Well I will turn up the volume.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: That's for the other box.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Okay...  Heeeere's what we're gonna do! Right down the hall is a bed room. All the real Glee fans are gonna go down the hall to the real Glee party in the bedroom, follow me! Where we can crank it!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [noise on TV, Oscar pauses show] That one! She's been in a couple episodes of Friday Night...

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: You know what? I'm so confused. Is this a Glee watching party? Or a Glee pausing party? 'Cause we keep stopping it, to get a history lesson from...

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: You know what? I didn't read the rules, I didn't know the rules. There, it's on. I didn't read the rule book.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [enters on Michael alone sitting on a bed watching Glee] Michael? Maybe you should try gong in the other room again. You can have my seat. It's closer to the TV. It'll seem louder.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Pam I have a loaded gun in my desk at work. If I ever start acting like that weenie Gabe I want you to take that gun, and I want you to shoot me like a hundred times in the groin until I'm dead. Okay?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: You have a gun in your desk?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: [in Gabe's bedroom with Andy] Hey! Marantz Tubes Sterio. From the 1970's. I respect that. I respect that a lot. Oh hoho. The five Chinese Berilidy Herbs. No kidding. This is powdered seahorse. They say that fifteen Chinese soldiers fought off the entire army of Gangus Kong just using this stuff. You know what they say...

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: No what?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: What is this, Samurai wood cuts? Yep. Pretty erotic.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [Pam in the background struggling with Cece] Better men than Gabe have tried to be my boss. David got fired. Charles got fired. Jan went crazy. Ed Truck, who I liked, got decapitated.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Michael, I find it absolutely disgraceful that no one followed you in here for your walk-out. I took the liberty of making a list of everyone who didn't follow you in here. Jim. Oscar. Creed. Me, at first.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Maybe I should go.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [continuing] Kelly. Kev- [to Pam] Are you gonna quiet that baby? Or do I have to? [Dwight grabs Cece and makes noises, Cece stops crying] In the Schrute family, the youngest child always raises the others. I've been raising children since I was a baby.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [to Andy] Take a shot.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Oh thanks.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Wow, so much Asia stuff. I wonder if there's a guy in China right now, looking at a bunch of our stuff.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Why does Erin like Gabe?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Andy look, all I know is that if I was a girl, and I had to choose between the tall dude who loved Asia, and the you looking dude who loves sweaters and wearing sweaters... I'd choose you.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: That's really nice, thank you.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: And I'd blow your mind.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [pours powdered seahorse into his wine glass]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [changes channel during commercial, sports scores appear on screen.]

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Jim what are you doing?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh, it was commercial break so I just wanted to check the scores.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Flip it back please.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Okay... [changes back to Glee]

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: The show's back on, what happened?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: We're behind.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Go to the recorded version.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Oh my God what song was that?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I wasn't recording it.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: What?!

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: [texting] What song was it?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Wait, why do you have to record it?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: This is why Erin! We're living it! Start recording now!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Jim. [Jim gives her the remote]

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Okay, they did Blinded by the Light and they did it with an actual blind guy. Was it worth it Jim? [Jim leaves] 'Cause we missed it!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: If I could get her sleeping normally I could get my life back.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: That would be nice wouldn't it?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I can't even talk about it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You know it's not really necessary for me to sit here holding her all night. Just go into Gabe's refrigerator, get a lump of suit, or any kind of congealed animal fat will do rally, tie a piece of string to it and the other end to her toe, put the suit in her mouth, she'll be happy for hours.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I kind of doubt Gabe has suit.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Really? Oh... Then here we are.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Michael. Gabe is making the pigs in a blanket, and he kind of needs some [Dwight shushes her] help so, [Erin whispering] he was wondering if you could help him. [Michael goes with Erin]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [enters room where Phyllis is pouring wine, using stadium announcer voice] Ladies and gentlemen please welcome, Phyllis Vance! [sniffs her] Isn't that White Diamonds Maya Smith Taylor?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: You know your perfumes!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: My nanny used to wear that.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I just ate powdered seahorse! I have to admit I did not think it was gonna work, but it is totally working! [clip of him doing pull ups in Gabe's doorway] I feel exactly like a seahorse! [Seahorse impression] Blub blub blub blub blub blub blub blub.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Look who I found! [points to Michael]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeah, well I wasn't very hard to find.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Let's go ahead and wash our hands.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Is this the same dough you used for the pizza crust?

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Yep! Waste not right?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: So these are pizza dogs, they aren't pigs in a blanket per se.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Michael knows everything there is to know about snacks,

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well...

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Gabe was born in 1982. He was the longest baby in the hospital.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: He's the longest baby in this room.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: What's the longest thing you've ever seen? [Michael chuckles] For me it was the tale from Jets.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Erin you don't have to...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You know what Erin you do have to.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Michael! You are making this harder than it has to be.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [grimacing] That's what she said. [leaves]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [whispering] Hey.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: It's a miracle. She loves him.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I don't know about, love...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: She loves me.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: [whispers in Dwight's ear] Outside my car in two minutes.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Well something's come up, I have to go.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No no no no no! She'll wake up!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I have something to do.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Look, I know what you have to do, please stay with Cece. Dwight? I've always considered for us to be very good friends. Great friends! Remember your concussion?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I do. But you married my worst enemy.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Well I think enemy's a strong word. 'Cause I think we have a really charming back and forth. And-

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Enough. I will require beer and pizza to think this over.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Absolutely! [starts out]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: From Jim.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I don't think that's gonna...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Do it!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What kind of pizza would you like?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Surprise me. No! Pepperoni.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [outside opening Gabe's cable hookup box] Okay... Alright.

quotes.speaker: TV
quotes.text: And the winner is, by two votes- [TV goes blank]

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Ahhh! What's going on?!?!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [muttering going on all around, Andy looks sick] Hey Creed, would you read Chinese?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: Beleniege!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: What does this say?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: HI mahhhh. Boo yowww. Gunjo! Ooh uncow!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [confused, rushes out of the room to the room Erin's in, picks up phone, talking fast] Hello UPS! Still waiting on that five minutes with Erin order. Oh never mind it's here. Oh if it isn't the bell of the ball! [queasily] You throw a lovely party ma lady...

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [concerned] Are you having a good time?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Did you wear my favorite outfit on purpose?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Andy you look awful!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: You're four seasons in a day. [heaves] You... got the Autumn thing going on. But if you put on ba- [heaves again] Put if you put on a blue... [stops, is struggling] It's Spring Time in the Rockies!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Are you alright?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: No! [runs off]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [referring to the pizza Jim is offering him] Insert it in my mouth.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: That's not gonna make your pizza eating experience any better. Trust me.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, try me.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Jim, just don't think of it as degrading. Think of it as, you happen to be moving the six inches his way and he happens to be biting it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'd prefer for him to think of it as degrading.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Okay... [puts pizza into Dwight's mouth]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No. Crust first. [Jim turns the pizza around] Okay, now the beer. [Jim shakes his head no] Beer me Jim. [Jim quickly puts the beer into his face] Ssss. Gentle. [drinks the beer] Now I've gotta go meet Angela.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: What no, wait! You said you were gonna help us!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I have a legal obligation to Angela. Okay, she needs to be serviced.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You need to stop talking.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh come on, stop the fake prissy act. We're in the real world. Sex contracts exist!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Okay fine! There must be some way to get out of it. Even just for tonight!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah sure, Jim could go see her.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [unbelievingly] Okay...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You ever been with the blondes before? It's the big leagues.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm going home, and I'm taking my baby with me.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No no no, don't. I will go talk to Angela.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: She's in heat. She will eat your face off!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: The reverse cycling ends tonight! [Pam leaves]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [to Jim] A single piece of pepperoni please.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm not gonna- [cuts himself off, Kevin walks in]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: What are you doing?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [getting under the bed covers] I wanted to eat a pig in a blanket, in a blanket!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [throws up on bed] Puts pillow in front of the puke.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Are you alright?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Erin likes Gabe.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: I know. I thought you two were nice together.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Do you think that they've ever...

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Made love? I don't know.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Well girls tell each other things right?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: I'll see what I can find out.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [Michael walks into disarray of people's reactions to the TV going out] Where you been?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I just went out for a walk.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Cable's out.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What? Really? That stinks!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: It's still on upstairs.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What does that mean? Party's over? Everybody leaves? Are you sure?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: [receiving message on his phone] Hey! Puck and Finn worked it out, and the solo is now a duet.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Are you kidding me?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Now that's going on?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I can't believe we're missing that!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Boy I wish I could see that. You know what? I have an idea. I don't know if it's gonna work, but let me give it this. Okay, I'm gonna give it shot. [hurries out]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Please Michael, just make the Glee happen!

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Good luck Michael!

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Erin! Uhm, so how long have you two been going out now?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh, uhm, like three months.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: And I imagine things are starting to heat up?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I don't know.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Of course you don't wanna rush things! I mean the anticipation can be so exquisite. Bob and I took our time. The first time we saw each other naked we didn't even make love, we just stared at each other until we fell asleep. It was magical.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [awkwardly] I have to go Phyllis.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Magical...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [knocking on Angela's car window, Angela is naked inside] Hey in there. It's Pam. It's not Dwight! Don't think it's Dwight!

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: What are you doing here?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I know you and Dwight have this weird deal, uhm, he sent me out here to see if you could postpone.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Are you authorized to do this?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yes! I have been so authorized.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Ok, uhm, then tell him that we'll do this tomorrow night instead.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Okay.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Wait Pam! How did he seem? Like, you know, did he seem disappointed?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: You know, there are a lot of guys out there who would just love and appreciate a-

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: You know what Pam just save it.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [Michael is outside fixing the cable box] You did this?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No I was just check- Yeah. Yes I did, yeah yeah.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Why don't you like him?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What is there to like? He's just, he's a weird little skeevy guy with no waist, why do you care whether we like him or not?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I care if you like him.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Why? I'm not your father. [Erin looks sad] All right.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Okay...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Go to your room.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: What? [confused]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Go to your room young lady!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [slowly getting it] Uhm, I'm not going to my room.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You listen to me. You listen good. You are are not, to see that boy, anymore.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: You listen to me. You are not to tell me what to do.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: As long as you are living under this roof you are going to do what I say.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I hate your roof!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh do not raise your voice to me!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I'll raise it how I want! I'll raise the roof!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Gahh, I will pull this car over!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I hate it! I hate your car!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: See ya Oscar! [Oscar leaves]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [enters, looks to Gabe] If you break that girl's heart, I will kill you. It's just a figure of speech. But seriously, if you break that girl's heart I will literally kill you and your entire family.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Gabe, just go and have fun with Erin. But not too much fun! That girl's gonna turn my hair gray.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: [Andy is leaning over toilet] What happened?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I accidentally ate some seahorses.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: How much?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I didn't know it's powdered, so like four or five, I don't know.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: I've got just the thing! [leaves, comes back with a synthesizer] This one's called Earth Rise, on the Moon. [music plays]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: That's so beautiful.
